title: Video of Cop Beating Wife Shared in Pak as Hindus Killing Muslims
subtitle: A tweet from a Pakistani handle @da_watan_lewany posted a video of two injured women, claiming that Indian Hindus were entering the homes of Muslims and killing them without any reason.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A tweet from a Pakistani handle @da_watan_lewany posted a video of two injured women, claiming that Indian Hindus were entering the homes of Muslims and killing them without any reason.

The video showed a woman bleeding from her lips and face, while another was trying to wake her up. The audio message claimed that the incident occurred in Jhansi, Baruasagar.

The tweet asked the Pakistanis to value their army which was “protecting them from the Hindus.”
